ROM.Changelog:
Added double to sleep on lockscreen.
Added lockscreen media art toggle.
Added double tap to sleep on statusbar.
Added toggle to disable power menu on secure lock screen.
—> Allow to kill any app from recents panel in a safe way.
—> Display bluetooth battery status when available. —> Show 4G instead of LTE switch. —> Hide lockscreen items. —> Allow doubletap/longpress power to toggle torch. —> Show carrier label / custom label. —> Allow to suppress sound/vibration if screen on . —> Fixed offline charging. —> Fixed issues with cast. —> Added fling dark icons. —> Merge tag 'LA.UM.6.4.r1-05700-8x98.0' into qcom_sepolicy. —> Change dimen to removed left padding. —> Allow to remove forced start margin. —> Added ambient display music ticker. —> Rebased Launcher3. —> Enabled sepolicy for all. —> Screen off animations. —> add automatic albumart base color mode for pulse. —> Add vpn icon in tuner. —> Powermenu lockscreen visibility for others. —> Smart notification sound options. —> Removed volte icon and appen volte status in carrier name. —> Fixed some null errors and crashes . —> Some more improvements and clean ups in sources. —> Allow to dismiss keyguard automatically when face is recognised. —> Fixed dialog colors on dark/black theme. —> Removed left padding in settings. —> Added OTA app. —> Show internal storage by default in Documets UI. —> Enabled qs panel transparency. —> Updated prebuilt retro APK. —> Exposed notification log. —> Added sim enable toggle. —> Unlink notification and ringer sound. —> Improved Thermals and upstreamed kernel. —> Latest lineage merges.
